api_list.api_description: Get information about a specific item by item_id.

required_parameters.name: item_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the barter.vg item (e.g. game or DLC)

api_list.api_description: Retrieve information about a single card by its ID.

query: Could you provide information about a specific item from Barter using an item ID and also retrieve details about a Pokémon card from TCGDex using its card ID?
